00036 ## Application() class
00037 #  
00038 #  Instances of this class generates the application window
00039 class Application(wx.Frame):
00040     """Main app window. Everything starts here.
00041        Keeps the main widgets (menu, upper and left toolbar, console, canvas, XML editor, etc.
00042        Initialises or uses the (common) settings object, the state object and the model object."""

00063         #  various menu entries are added when the *Callbacks series of object are 
00064         #  instantiated. 
00065         self.menuBar      = None  # children - submenus
00066

00068         #
